page.title: 03THE YOUNGER GENERATION
page.content: Many wished to see more local sport and leisure facilities,especially for the young. They saw the need for a children's park, adequate disposal of sewage,proper control of traffic and access to relevant and up to date books in the Library. Many felt that Britain is characterised by a them and us class system which prevents people from initiating meaningful xhange and dealing with society's fundamental problems. Many felt a desire to live in countries where there is more scope for use of leisure time. They felt that the l98O's will be judged as a time of general disillusion.
